title: 2021 FIVB Volleyball Girls' U18 World Championship
description:
The 2021 FIVB Volleyball Girls' U18 World Championship will be the 17th edition of the FIVB Volleyball Girls' U18 World Championship, contested by the women's national teams under the age of 18 of the members of the Fédération Internationale de Volleyball (FIVB), the sport's global governing body. The final tournament will be held in Mexico. Mexico were chosen as the hosts for this event for the second time after previously hosting the 2007 tournament.
United States are the defending champions, having won their first title in Egypt.
